BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: JANE F AND D LAWRENCE SHERMAN FAMILY

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE JEWISH COMMUNITY AND THE COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE JEWISH COMMUNITY AND THE COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS AND AWARDS GIVEN TO CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT IS THE PRIMARY NAMED SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION; CERTAIN OTHER SUPPORTED ORGANIZATIONS ARE NAMED AND OTHERS ARE DEFINED BY CLASS. THE ORGANIZATION SUPPORTS BOTH THE JEWISH COMMUNITY AND THE COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE.

THE GRANT RECIPIENTS ARE ALL 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS THAT ARE DESIGNATED BY CLASS IN THE GOVERNING DOCUMENT. IN FURTHERANCE OF THE MISSION OF ITS SUPPORT ORGANIZATION, THE JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT, THE ORGANIZATION SUPPORTS BOTH THE JEWISH COMMUNITY AND THE COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SUPPORTING FOUNDATION ENSURES THAT THE ENTITIES RECEIVING THE FUNDS ARE 501(C)(3) CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS.

COMPENSATION FOR BOARD MEMBERS IS DETERMINED AT THE CONTROLLING ORGANIZATION LEVEL, JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT. JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT DETERMINES OFFICER SALARY BASED ON THE FOLLOWING: A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTANT, COMPENSATION SURVEY, AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOLLOWING BOARD MEMBERS HAVE FAMILY RELATIONSHIPS: JANE F. SHERMAN AND D. LAWRENCE SHERMAN JANE F. SHERMAN AND DAVID SHERMAN JANE F. SHERMAN AND SYLVIA WOLF JANE F. SHERMAN AND SCOTT SHERMAN D. LAWRENCE SHERMAN AND DAVID SHERMAN D. LAWRENCE SHERMAN AND SYLVIA WOLF D. LAWRENCE SHERMAN AND SCOTT SHERMAN DAVID SHERMAN AND SYLVIA WOLF DAVID SHERMAN AND SCOTT SHERMAN SYLVIA WOLF AND SCOTT SHERMAN

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DELEGATED MANAGEMENT DUTIES TO THE JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT HAS THE ABILITY TO APPOINT MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS GRANTED AUTHORITY TO THE TREASURER AND FINANCE DIRECTOR OF THE JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT TO REVIEW THE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL RECEIVE A COPY OF THE FORM 990 AFTER IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, BOARD MEMBERS OF THE FOUNDATION DISCLOSE IN WRITING ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. THIS DOCUMENTATION IS MAINTAINED ON FILE. AT THE TIME OF VOTING, BOARD MEMBERS ARE ASKED TO CITE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST, IF ANY EXIST, AND ABSTAIN FROM INDIVIDUAL VOTES IF APPROPRIATE. THIS PROCESS IS REPORTED IN THE BOARD MEETING MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
ALLOCATION OF ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSES FROM THE JEWISH 16,512. FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT
THE ORGANIZATION RELIES ON THE AUDIT COMMITTEE OF THE JEWISH FEDERATION OF METROPOLITAN DETROIT FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO MEET THE NEEDS OF JEWISH FAMILIES & INDIVIDUALS IN METRO DETROIT
